entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 3:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
